Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Downtown Dartmouth is growing and thriving like never before. With over 200 businesses in the area, it is transforming into an area where more people are choosing to live, work and play. This commercial space is located in close proximity to the Halifax Harbour Waterfront, the Alderney Ferry Terminal and many transit stops. Located on the corner of Wentworth and Portland Street, this commercial unit is positioned just steps from many local restaurants and cafés, a diverse range of retailers, major banks, pharmacies and health services. This unit could be ideal for a retailer, café, or service based business (i.e. salon or barbershop). See flyer for more details.

Downtown Dartmouth is growing and thriving like never before. With over 200 businesses in the area, it is transforming into an area where more people are choosing to live, work and play. This commercial space is located in close proximity to the Halifax Harbour Waterfront, the Alderney Ferry Terminal and many transit stops. Located on the corner of Wentworth and Portland Street, this commercial unit is positioned just steps from many local restaurants and cafés, a diverse range of retailers, major banks, pharmacies and health services. This unit could be ideal for a retailer, office user or service based bluishness (i.e. salon or barbershop). See the flyer for more!

The Hazelton, located on Seapoint Road at the base of Burnside is the first of many multi-residential buildings to take shape in this growing waterfront community. This prominent building is highly visible from Windmill Road which sees 50,000 + cars pass by each day. Easily accessed by two lighted intersections, your staff, customers and clients can enjoy safe and easy access from all directions. Ideally situated in one of Halifax’s most active commercial nodes and just a short drive from the McKay Bridge, Bedford Highway and the Circumferential highway, this location is accessible to all. Here you will benefit from transit access and ample nearby street parking. In addition to the 2,000+ business’ in Burnside, you will neighbour the Virtue Hair Studio, Starbucks, Pita Pit and McDonald’s; all major traffic drivers to the area. See the flyer for more details!

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: The Hazelton, 39 Seapoint Road, Dartmouth NS

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: See the flyer for more details!
